title: Dwarven Toughness
content:
.

Dwarven Toughness Information

Your Hit Point maximum increases by 1, and it increases by 1 again every time you gain a level.

How to unlock Dwarven Toughness

Dwarven Toughness can be acquired by

Gold Dwarf Lvl 1
